findings.title: Missing string messages in require statements
findings.description: Many `require` statements are missing a string message containing the details/reason for the error.

findings.title: Unvalidated secretHashes_ parameter
findings.description: The `request()` function does not check if the `secretHashes_` parameter actually contains 8 non-empty values.

findings.title: Mixed tabs and spaces in code
findings.description: Tabs and spaces are mixed in the code, which can lead to inconsistent formatting and potential errors.

findings.title: Incomplete comment on L45 of Sales.sol
findings.description: The comment on L45 of Sales.sol is missing one or more words.

findings.title: Non-indexed address parameters in events
findings.description: Address parameters in events should be indexed.

findings.title: Testing code included amongst main code repository
findings.description: There are several locations where mainnet constants are commented out in favor of testnet constants.

findings.title: Outdated job IDs for mainnet
findings.description: It should be checked that the job IDs defined on L6-10 of BlockchainInfo.sol are up-to-date.
